page.title: 02Boston Market
page.content: The market comes twice a week on Saturday and Wednesday it opens at 8.30on Saturday and 7.30 on Wednesday.Sometimes the council puts it up the night before.They sell fish,meat,computer games, clothes, jewellery, bags, animal toys, trees, plants, sweets, ornaments, string, toys, lamp shades, shoe laces and second hand things of the Green.Most of the stalls are made of wood,steel and alluminium.People will come from Skegness,Ingamells,Mablethorpe ect. They come into Boston by buses or cars.
